title: maxCmd not remapping causing vehicle to flail

content.html:
Hi, I noticed that my parameter <maxCmd> did not remap in the thruster model, as even at 10% thrust (max cmd = 1000, cmd = 100), the thruster started to spin about the main axis. I then noticed this was due to this line in SpinPropeller in usv_gazebo_thrust_plugin.cc: effort = (this->thrusters[_i].currCmd / kMaxInput) * kMaxEffort;

kMaxInput was set to 1.0 and was thus constant regardless of maxCmd.
